name: Astromine
description:
In Astromine, be a greedy astronaute in a plateform-puzzle game !

Explore various level and look carefully, because you'll always be searching some rare gems !

WARNING : The game is in Azerty, so if you got a qwerty keyboard you'll need to change it on the down right corner of your screen (or play with a controler)

======

This game was made by a group of 8 in 2 months, mostly during the covid pandemic, as a school project (we got 19.5/20, take that metacritic !). Our group is called "Public Void Games"

Programmers :

  • Benoît BLANC
  • Elioth BENARD 
  • François DUPREZ 
  • Lucille BISSON 
  • Nicolas PUISSANT

Graphic artists :

  • Ianis FEVRIER
  • Yves QUARMENIL
  • Edouard TROTIN-DECROX

Musics :

  • Kevin MACLEOD

Our school, CREAJEUX
